name: MumpsTestsForMumpsVirusIgMAntibody
title: Mumps (Tests for mumps virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mumps virus IgM antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Mumps IgM/Mumps IgG+IgM Ab;  

LOINC search: 'Mumps virus IgM Ab -panel -interpretation'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests/ interpretation test)
